title: Mass. man reports being shot with pellet gun while golfing
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The man was golfing at the Leo J.
Martin Golf Course in Weston when he was hit in the side with a pellet from a gun.
The man told Weston police that he was hit with the pellet while golfing at the Leo J.

title: Cam Newton doubles down on ‘fool’s gold’ Patriots comment, says he’s a ‘Drake Maye fan’
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I'm a Drake Maye fan.
But Drake Maye, you still have to prove yourself in a situation where I do not think that the AFC goes through New England.
" Cam Newton's recent comments have caused a stir for Patriots fans.

title: Prosecutors won’t retry man who had murder conviction overturned after 27 years in prison
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The man was sentenced to life in prison in 1998 after he was found guilty of murdering a convenience store clerk.
Ricky McGee walks free Oct.
14 outside Suffolk Superior Court nearly three decades after he was convicted of murder.

title: Mass. man charged after police report finding 9 explosive devices in his truck
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News A Princeton man was arrested and charged on Thursday after police said they found nine explosive devices in his truck.
A Princeton man was arrested and charged Thursday after police allegedly found nine explosive devices in his truck, the Princeton Police Department said in a release.
Jason Baldarelli, 27, pleaded not guilty in Leominster District Court to possessing explosives.

title: 2 dead after 100 mph Maine police chase ends in crash
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News The crash happened after the vehicle became airborne after it struck a mailbox, hit two utility poles, and collided with a tree, the local sheriff's office said.
Two people were killed on Monday night in Livermore, Maine after a high speed police chase ended in a car crash, the local sheriff said.
A deputy from the sheriff’s office parked at Turner Town Office noticed a vehicle traveling north on Route 4 at high speed with a loud exhaust around 10:30 p.

title: Man found dead in vehicle at rest area in N.H.
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News A man was found dead inside of his vehicle in a rest area on Interstate 93 in Hooksett on Wednesday, New Hampshire State Police said in a news release.
By Sana Muneer November 20, 2025 Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A man was found dead inside of his vehicle at a rest area on Interstate 93 in Hooksett on Wednesday, New Hampshire State Police said in a news release.

title: Police continue search for Gardner man accused of killing wife in 2023
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime More than two years ago, Aaron Pennington allegedly murdered his wife at home in Gardner and vanished.
Gardner resident Aaron Pennington, 35, is wanted for murder in connection with his wife's death.

Worcester County District Attorney's Office By Abby Patkin November 20, 2025 | 4:32 PM 1 minute to read Authorities reignited their manhunt for Aaron Pennington on Thursday, more than two years after the Air Force veteran allegedly murdered his wife at home in Gardner and promptly vanished.
